item.title: Becky add a quote by Kahlil Gibran
item.description: "Out of suffering have emerged the strongest souls; the most massive characters are seared with scars." -- Kahlil Gibran

item.title: Becky add a quote by Kahlil Gibran
item.description: "No human relation gives one possession in anotherâ€”every two souls are absolutely different. In friendship or in love, the two side by side raise hands together to find what one cannot reach alone." -- Kahlil Gibran

item.title: Becky add a quote by Khalil Gibran
item.description: "For even as love crowns you so shall he crucify you. Even as he is for your growth so is he for your pruning. Even as he ascends to your height and caresses your tenderest branches that quiver in the sun, so shall he descend to your roots and shake them in their clinging to the earth." -- Khalil Gibran

item.title: Becky add a quote by Kahlil Gibran
item.description: "When you are sorrowful look again in your heart, and you shall see that in truth you are weeping for that which has been your delight." -- Kahlil Gibran

item.title: Becky add a quote by Donald Miller
item.description: "...sometimes you have to watch somebody love something before you can love it yourself..." -- Donald Miller

item.title: Becky add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Presume not that I am the thing I was." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Becky add a quote by James Joyce
item.description: "A corpse is meat gone bad. Well and what's cheese? Corpse of milk. " -- James Joyce

item.title: Becky add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "I believe in Christianity as I believe that the sun has risen: not only because I see it, but because by it I see everything else." -- C.S. Lewis
